param.name: root
param.label: Menu root
param.description: If you select only one category, only its childrens will be shown. On multiple selection, the selected will be on the first level.

param.name: rootasitem
param.label: Singe root as menuitem
param.description: If enabled and one selected in the previous option, the behaviour will be the same as multiple selection.

param.name: showproducts
param.label: Show entries
param.description: If enabled, entries are included in the menu.

param.name: displaynum
param.label: Display number of products
param.description: Display the product count available in a category, if any.
